chart.title: Annual budget of NASA
chart.subtitle: This data is expressed in US dollars, adjusted for inflation.
chart.note: This data is expressed in constant 2020 US$.

Annual budget of NASA.descriptionShort: This data is expressed in US dollars, adjusted for inflation.
descriptionKey: NASA's budget categorizations have changed throughout the agency's history.
All adjustments for inflation are made using the GDP Chained Price Index published by the US Office of Management and Budget.
Annual budget of NASA.citationShort: CSIS Aerospace Security Project (2022) – with minor processing by Our World in Data
Annual budget of NASA.citationLong: CSIS Aerospace Security Project (2022) – with minor processing by Our World in Data. “Annual budget of NASA” [dataset]. CSIS Aerospace Security Project, “History of the NASA Budget” [original data].
